MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G77 area of Newton Mearns, affecting properties in Malletsheugh Road and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:30am due to repairs required to our underground electricity network after third party damage and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:59am on Friday, 29 January 2021
